## TransactableLiquity.claimCollateralSurplus() method

Claim leftover collateral after a liquidation or redemption.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
claimCollateralSurplus(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./arth-lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

Use [getCollateralSurplusBalance()](./arth-lib-base.readableliquity.getcollateralsurplusbalance.md) to check the amount of collateral available for withdrawal.
